news.title: Watch: Kingfishr give surprise performance at couple's wedding
news.summary: The band stepped up when a groom requested a copy of their upcoming single 'Next To Me' for his first dance

news.title: Happy 50th Birthday Jack White: Revisiting a Classic Hot Press Interview
news.summary: As Jack White celebrates his 50th birthday, we're rewinding it back to 2009. On a fleeting visit to Dublin, the legendary musician sat down with Stuart Clark to discuss his past life as an upholsterer.

news.title: The Swell Season's Glen Hansard and Markéta Irglová: "We’re singing from a different place, because our relationship has deepened and broadened"
news.summary: With their stunning Forward album about to be released, Glen Hansard and Markéta Irglová recall their Swell Season career highlights, explain the musical magic that happens when they get together and also hold forth on Bono, Billie Eilish, ABBA and the war in Ukraine.

news.title: Irish YouTuber Adam McIntyre reported to ICE on fraudulent visa violation claims
news.summary: "This is no longer snarking," McIntyre said. "This is not a joke. And this is where it has crossed a line."

news.title: Rowan Murphy signs with Nettwerk Music Group and announces new EP
news.summary: Hear the first track of Murphy's debut EP below.

news.title: Soulwax announce first album in seven years All Systems Are Lying
news.summary: They also shared the accompanying lead singles ‘All Systems Are Lying’ and ‘Run Free’.

news.title: Ed Sheeran to exhibit original artwork, painted in London car park
news.summary: Ed Sheeran's 'Cosmic Carpark Paintings' will be on display from July 11 to August 1 at London's Heni Gallery

news.title: Del Water Gap to play two Irish shows next month
news.summary: He will play Belfast's Ulster Hall and Dublin’s National Stadium on August 26 and 27.

news.title: The 2 Johnnies to play major Belfast show next month
news.summary: Tickets for their Belfast show can be found below.

news.title: THISISPOPBABY to premiere new show Octopus Children at Dublin Fringe Festival
news.summary: Written by FELISPEAKS, it debuts at the Project Arts Centre in September.
